channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The Score: Intuitive Machines, Intel, Nike and More Stocks That Defined the Week
item.description: Here are some of the major companies whose stocks moved on the week’s news.

item.title: ‘We have no health insurance’: My wife died, leaving behind a lot of medical debt. Am I responsible for her debt?
Qualcomm Approached Intel About a Takeover in Recent Days
item.description: A deal for Intel would be massive and come at a time when the chip maker is sputtering.

item.title: Boeing’s defense chief is leaving, company says
item.description: Boeing Co. said that Ted Colbert — its head of defense, space and security — would leave the company on Friday, as the beleaguered aviation giant’s ne...

item.title: Motel 6 Sold to Oyo, Indian Hotel Giant That Is Ramping Up in U.S.
item.description: Blackstone agrees to sell one of America’s most recognizable lodging chains for $525 million.

item.title: Intel’s stock seals strong week. But would a Qualcomm merger make sense?
item.description: One fund manager sees “more cons than pros” if the companies were to combine, after the Wall Street Journal reported that Qualcomm approached Intel ab...

item.title: Solving the Mystery of an Investment That's Too Good to Be True
item.description: Chasing the promise of a 17.1% return reveals nonexistent companies, illusory returns and unlicensed salespeople making absurd claims.

item.title: Tech giants desperate to power AI data centers are turning to nuclear disaster sites — despite the risks
item.description: The tech industry’s need for more power for data centers running artificial intelligence is now so desperate that companies are turning to nuclear dis...

item.title: Is Your Bag Luxurious Enough for a Government Lawsuit?
item.description: The Coach and Michael Kors case shows the limits of antitrust challenges.

item.title: Uranium ETFs rally amid plans to revive nuclear reactor in Microsoft agreement
item.description: Constellation Energy said Friday it plans to restart a nuclear reactor at Three Mile Island.
